nodes.description: 孟买南孟买Operahouse和Zaveri Bazar、市中心Dadar West发生三起爆炸
nodes.support_text: Three explosions have taken place in Mumbai on Wednesday evening - two in South Mumbai at Opera House and in Zaveri Bazar and one at Dadar West, in central Mumbai.

nodes.description: 印度内政部确认事件为恐怖袭击，孟买进入高度戒备
nodes.support_text: The Home Ministry has confirmed a terrorist attack and Mumbai is on high alert.

nodes.description: Zaveri Bazar目击者称约15-20人送医
nodes.support_text: Eyewitnesses said about 15 to 20 people have taken to hospital in Zaveri Bazar.

nodes.description: 确认Dadar West爆炸系汽车炸弹
nodes.support_text: One explosion, in a car at a bus stop in Dadar West, has been confirmed.

nodes.description: Khau gali街道配电箱发现可疑爆炸物
nodes.support_text: A police officer said there might have been an explosive in a meter box behind a hoarding at Khau gali...

nodes.description: Dadar发现未爆炸弹，排爆小组正在处理
nodes.support_text: An unexploded bomb has also reportedly been found in Dadar and a bomb disposal squad is working to defuse it.

nodes.description: 警方指挥中心接到炸弹威胁电话
nodes.support_text: Early reports said a police control room had received a call claiming that there were serial blasts in Mumbai.

nodes.description: 国家调查局(NIA)团队从德里抵达调查
nodes.support_text: The National Investigation Agency (NIA) team has rushed to Mumbai from Delhi to investigate...

nodes.description: 德里、钦奈、班加罗尔进入高度戒备
nodes.support_text: Malls, markets and other crowded places in Delhi, Chennai and Bangalore are on high alert.

edges.support_text: The Home Ministry has confirmed a terrorist attack and Mumbai is on high alert.
Eyewitnesses said about 15 to 20 people have taken to hospital in Zaveri Bazar.
One explosion, in a car at a bus stop in Dadar West, has been confirmed.
A police officer said there might have been an explosive in a meter box behind a hoarding at Khau gali...
An unexploded bomb has also reportedly been found in Dadar and a bomb disposal squad is working to defuse it.
Early reports said a police control room had received a call claiming that there were serial blasts in Mumbai.
The National Investigation Agency (NIA) team has rushed to Mumbai from Delhi to investigate...
Malls, markets and other crowded places in Delhi, Chennai and Bangalore are on high alert.
